New Records: Celtics match NBA-record 29 3-pointers in win vs. Knicks
Celtics match franchise record with 17 3-pointers in first half
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum fuels Celtics with 37 points, 10 assists in opener
KAT leaps over defender to drop in floater
Post-Match Reflections: Tatum, Celtics celebrate Banner 18 by making record-tying 29 3-pointers and crushing Knicks 132-109
Miscellaneous Highlights: Celtics miss hilarious amount of 3s attempting to break record
Others: BOS leads 1-0 in regular season series
Game 1 of the series was played on 10/22, Game 2 will be played on 2/9 on ABC, and Game 3 will be played on 2/23 on ABC
